EmailTemplate.name: Office Action - Merely Descriptive
EmailTemplate.subject: Office Action - Merely Descriptive
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom.
Office Actions are direct correspondences from the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO), and are generally either requesting additional information or updating you on the status of your application (or both). If you wish to view and/or download your Office Action, please visit here
Based on your Office Action, it appears your proposed Trademark—(INDICATE MARK) for (INDICATE G&S)—is being rejected because the Examining Attorney believes that it merely describes a purpose or function of your goods and/or services. A Trademark is merely descriptive if it describes an ingredient, quality, characteristic, function, feature, purpose or use of the specified goods and/or services. (INDICATE EXAMINER’S CONCERN-SEE OFFICE ACTION).
Based on the Office Action received, it also appears that your Examining Attorney at the USPTO has some additional questions:
****INSERT OFFICE ACTION ISSUES****
Although the Examining Attorney has refused registration, you may respond to the refusal to register by submitting evidence and arguments in support of the registration. You may also choose to appeal a final refusal.
Otherwise, you may contact the USPTO Assistance Center at 800-786-9199 or call your Examining Attorney: XXXXXX at XXX-XXX-XXXX. Additional instructions can be found at the bottom of your Office Action.
Please feel free to contact our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} if we can be of further assistance. Simply reply to this email, or call us toll free at {!snippetVariable.ccphone}. Our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} business hours are {!snippetVariable.cchours}.
Thank you again for using LegalZoom.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team ___________________________________
{!snippetVariable.tmoa_bap}
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
© LegalZoom.com, Inc. All rights reserved.
